titleStmt.title: The first set of English madrigals to 3.4.5. and 6. voices: newly composed by Iohn Wilbye
Madrigals, voices (3-6), set 1
titleStmt.author: Wilbye, John, 1574-1638.

notesStmt.note: Six partbooks. At head of title page, part 1: "Cantus"; part 2: "Altus"; part 3: "Tenor"; part 4: "Bassus"; part 5: "Quintus"; Part 6: "Sextus".

In all partbooks song 23 has: "Subdue her hart, who makes mee glad." In the Folger Shakespeare Library copy only tenor and sextus have the dedication to Sir C. Cavendish, with Table on the verso--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
